## nhs_prescriptions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `nhs_prescriptions` is to demonstrate operations on reasonably large data, using the NHS prescription level data as an example.

## Setup

Install packages

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages(c(
  "sparklyr",
  "arrow",
  "tidyverse",
  "mapdata",
  "mapproj",
  "hexbin"
))
```

Install spark

```{r, eval = FALSE}
sparklyr::spark_install()
```
